# Hunter's Lore (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a scrap of paper torn from a book about monsters)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Inner Sea Magic, pg. 56

Inquisitors and rangers alike learned long ago that knowledge of an enemy grants power over that enemy. This spell was created so that almost any enemy could have its vulnerabilities known and exploited.

For the duration of this spell you may spend a full-round action to take 20 on any [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skill checks made to identify a foeâ€™s weaknesses, provided the foe in question is within line of sight and provided that you have at least one
